A national citizens parliament concernin: A national citizens' parliament concerning the ecological emergencies
Memorandum for the new federal governmen: Memorandum aan de nieuwe federale regering
openingMessage: Party politics as usual has not been able to take the necessary measures to prevent ecological disasters such as climate change, biodiversity and biomass loss, pollution or soil erosion. Let's join many other countries and organize a national citizens' assembly to draft issues to these complex solutions!
